channel.title: [Help Needed] Click to proceed :D
channel.description:
Hey its me again :D
Me and my friend Kyle were wroking on a source to perfect our server, so I came here :D, we'll be working on our server 24/7 if ya know what I mean, but my question is...
Why dont our Compiler work?
Source we use is called BombScape and we dont wanna change, we erased all NCPs and everything to, we know how to make it over again, but how the heck do we make our compiler work?
when we try an compile we get this
[Code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client/java Press any key to continue . . . [/Code]
and code we use in our compiler is this...
[code] @echo off Color 2 java *.java pause
Could anyone help us? also if you would like to join us in our glourious server team please do so :D [/code]

item.title: [Help Needed] Click to proceed :D
item.dc:creator: @Anstant-Kill Anstant-Kill
item.description:
@Anstant-Kill wrote:

hello! what i do now???[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 04:41:53 PM[/size][hr]ok

Read full topic

item.title: [Help Needed] Click to proceed :D
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

@echo off
color 9
title Killscape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
JAVA -Xmx512m server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause;

Read full topic

item.title: [Help Needed] Click to proceed :D
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“soul raever, post:2, topic:23557”]@echo off
Color 2
javac *.java
pause[/quote]

He is correct. Note that in what you had for compiler, it said java *.java, not javac *.java.

Read full topic
